dataList.content: The sword-bearing child fell on his rear in shock, and the one wearing gauntlets reached out to help.

dataList.title: Liu Section 6
dataList.content: By striking the right spot at the right time, the Liu’s equipment can start a fire.
The taciturn child spoke to the one who collapsed on the floor, extending an arm equipped with his extinguished gauntlet.

dataList.title: Liu Section 6
dataList.content: On the other hand, nothing will be kindled if the trajectory and friction aren’t right. Fire cannot ignite by its lonesome.

dataList.title: Liu Section 6
dataList.content: I have been taught that this law guides all of the Liu; thus, fire will naturally spark, just as I naturally still remain in Section 6.
The confused child tilted their head as if a question still remained, while the one who answered looked at them with a faint smile.
